title: Workplace Harassment or Discrimination
description: When you face harassment, discrimination, or hostile work environment based on gender, caste, religion, or other protected characteristics

rights.title: Right to Work with Dignity
rights.description: Every employee has the right to work in an environment free from harassment and discrimination
rights.legalBasis: Sexual Harassment of Women at Workplace (Prevention, Prohibition and Redressal) Act, 2013

rights.title: Right to File Internal Complaint
rights.description: Right to file a complaint with Internal Complaints Committee (ICC) or Local Complaints Committee (LCC)

rights.title: Right to Protection from Retaliation
rights.description: Protection from victimization or discharge from employment for filing complaints

actionSteps.title: Document All Incidents
actionSteps.description: Keep detailed records of harassment incidents including dates, times, witnesses, and evidence like messages or emails

actionSteps.title: Check Company Policy
actionSteps.description: Review your company's anti-harassment policy and procedures for filing complaints

actionSteps.title: File Internal Complaint
actionSteps.description: Submit written complaint to Internal Complaints Committee (ICC) or HR department

actionSteps.title: File External Complaint if Needed
actionSteps.description: If no ICC exists or complaint not addressed, file with Local Complaints Committee or police

sources.title: Sexual Harassment of Women at Workplace Act, 2013
sources.authority: Ministry of Women and Child Development

sources.title: Constitution of India - Right to Equality
Indian Penal Code - Sections on Harassment

variations: Boss is harassing me at work
